member.name: T:PoroCYon.Extensions.Xna.Input.MouseHandler
member.summary: Custom structure to make calculations with the Mouse easier

member.name: P:PoroCYon.Extensions.Xna.Input.MouseHandler.Left
member.summary: whether the left mouse button is pressed or not (returns false when Main.blockMouse or Player.mouseInterface is true)

member.name: P:PoroCYon.Extensions.Xna.Input.MouseHandler.Right
member.summary: whether the right mouse button is pressed or not

member.name: P:PoroCYon.Extensions.Xna.Input.MouseHandler.Middle
member.summary: whether the middle button (scroll wheel) is pressed or not

member.name: P:PoroCYon.Extensions.Xna.Input.MouseHandler.XButton1
member.summary: whether the first X button is pressed or not

member.name: P:PoroCYon.Extensions.Xna.Input.MouseHandler.XButton2
member.summary: whether the second X button is pressed or not

member.name: P:PoroCYon.Extensions.Xna.Input.MouseHandler.Position
member.summary: Gets the position of the mouse, relative to the Terraria window

member.name: P:PoroCYon.Extensions.Xna.Input.MouseHandler.ScrollWheel
member.summary: Gets the current scroll wheel value
